name: Martial
description: You start with 1 Focus Point and your FP increases as shown in the Bastard Class Table. You also known Manuevers as shown in the table.

name: Weapon Proficiencies
description: You are Proficient with the following weapons: Sword, Dagger, Club, Mace, Bow, Hand Crossbow, and Crossbow.

name: Lightly Armored
description: You are Proficient with Light Armor.

name: Bastard's Focus
description: If you did not use FP on the Attack, you regain half of your FP when you:\\n- Hit a Flanked target.\\n- Hit a target affected by a Condition.

name: Debiltating Strike
description: When you have ADV on an Attack, if you hit the target creature, you can spend 1 SP to force the target to make a Might Save against your Save DC. On a failed Save, the target gains 1 level of *Stun* until the end of your next turn.

name: Roguish Finesse
description: You less-than-honest living has provided you with the following abilities:\\n- When you take the Disengage or Hide Action, you can move up to half your Speed.\\n- You gain Expertise in one Skill of your choice.\\n- You gain 1 Skill Point.
